Title: Provides a maximum $500 tax credit for taxpayer expenses not compensated by insurance related to the purchase of a qualified hearing aid
Summary: Provides a maximum $500 tax credit for taxpayer expenses, not compensated by insurance or otherwise, related to the purchase of a qualified hearing aid.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit to individuals for up to five hundred dollars of expenses not compensated by insurance for the purchase of a qualified hearing aid
